decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from 19 October 2015.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Archaeological Desk-Based Assessment, ASE report 2015286
Construction management plan by Motion
Internal Daylight Report dated 20/08/15 by CHP
Door Schedule by MWA
Energy and sustainability statement ref. 012007-RPT-00001 by Cundall
Existing site photographs dated August 2015
Floor Performance Assessment 1012007-RPT-AS0001 by Cundall
Heritage Statement dated June 2015 by AHP
Marketing report dated 14/08/15 by Vokins
Window & rooflight schedule by MWA

P_02 Rev C - Received 8/6/16
 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Before any of the dwellings hereby permitted are occupied, arrangements shall be agreed in writing with the local planning authority and be put in place to ensure that, no resident of the development shall obtain a resident's parking permit within any controlled parking zone which may be in force in the area at any time.

Condition : 6 - This consent does not permit the demolition or dismantling of any part of the building, or the removal of any external feature, except in so far as the repairs hereby approved necessitate the removal of certain parts of the existing structure as specifically shown on the approved drawings.
Condition : 7 - Where possible, and in the case of intervention in original walls, nib and/or downstands should be retained to show the historical past of the building.
Condition : 8 - All construction works shall be managed in accordance with the approved Construction Management Plan and in accordance with John Cromars report on the protection of trees

Condition : 9 - None of the residential units hereby permitted shall be occupied or used until the provision for car and cycle parking for that building shown on the application drawings has been implemented in full and the cycle parking shall thereafter be retained solely for its designated use.

Condition : 10 - None of the residential units hereby permitted shall be occupied or used until the west boundary wall is constructed. The wall shall be constructed in line with the details approved under 00590/12-13/P2(10).
Condition : 11 - The scheme of sound insulation shown on the approved drawings shall be carried out before any part of the development hereby permitted is occupied.
description: Listed building consent for the change of use of property from B1 office to C3 residential use to provide 5 self contained flats with associated modifications to building
